Title: Tre uomini e una gamba
Director: Aldo Baglio, Giacomo Poretti, Giovanni Storti, Massimo Venier
Writer: Aldo Baglio (story), Giovanni Storti (story), Giacomo Poretti (story), Giorgio Gherarducci (story), Massimo Venier (story), Aldo Baglio, Giovanni Storti, Giacomo Poretti, Giorgio Gherarducci, Lucio Martignoni, Massimo Venier
Actors: Aldo Baglio, Giovanni Storti, Giacomo Poretti, Marina Massironi
Plot: Three friends cross Italy by car in order to deliver their boss his dog and a wooden leg.
